_comment: Camera Configuration Template - Essential Fields Only
_documentation: This template contains only the necessary fields for camera operation. Each field is documented below.

camera_info._doc_model: Specific camera model number for hardware identification
camera_info._doc_serial_number: Unique camera serial number for inventory tracking
camera_info._doc_alias: Friendly name for easy identification (e.g., 'Main Entrance Cam')
camera_info._doc_address: Full physical address of the store/location (e.g., '123 Main Street, City, State 12345')
camera_info._doc_map_location: GPS coordinates or map link for store location (e.g., '40.7128,-74.0060' or 'https://maps.google.com/...')
camera_info._doc_installation_date: Date when camera was installed (YYYY-MM-DD format)

connection._comment: Network connection settings for RTSP stream
connection._doc_host: Camera IP address on the network
connection._doc_stream_path: RTSP stream path for main stream (high resolution)
connection._doc_full_url: Complete RTSP URL for direct connection

video_settings._doc_resolution: Video resolution in pixels (width x height)
video_settings._doc_fps: Frames per second for video stream

roi._comment: Region of Interest - area where people detection occurs
roi._doc_roi_coordinates: Polygon coordinates defining detection area (clockwise order)

counting_line._comment: Virtual line for counting people crossings
counting_line._doc_counting_line_points: Start and end coordinates of counting line

detection_settings._doc_min_object_size: Minimum object size in pixels to filter noise
detection_settings._doc_max_object_size: Maximum object size in pixels to filter large objects

alerts._doc_threshold: People count threshold to trigger alerts
alerts._doc_cooldown_period: Alert cooldown period in seconds to prevent spam

network._doc_retry_attempts: Number of retry attempts for failed connections
